input.sentences: there was a beautiful view of the city from where we were standing .
a very well built statue was behind the big screen .

output.sentences: Viewing this beautiful city, while standing with thousands of people on the riverbank, was an exhilerating experience. wer
We watched a giant screen that fronted a tall statue.
We were there for to experience an inspiring moment in history, so we overlooked the amount of shoulders and legs that kept jostling us.
Fortunately, the speakers worked and the visuals shown on the screen were crystal clear.
A sign showed that a world record was broke.
